sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import Bgimg from '../assets/images/banner/tc-bg.jpg'; function TermsConditions() { return (

Terms & Conditions

IslamicMatch.org is an online matrimonial service provider for muslims globally. In order to use IslamicMatch website (IslamicMatch.org) you must sign up as a member of IslamicMatch.org (Member) and agree to be bound by these Terms & conditions. If you wish to become a Member of the IslamicMatch.org and communicate with other Members and make use of the IslamicMatch.org services (the "Service"), please read the various services provided by IslamicMatch.org before registering your profile as a Member. The Users availing services from IslamicMatch.org shall be deemed to have read, understood and agreed to the terms and conditions hereof and this agreement shall govern the relationship between you and IslamicMatch.org and all transactions or services by, with or in connection with IslamicMatch.org for all purposes, and shall be unconditionally bind between the parties without any reservation. All rights, privileges, obligations and liabilities of you and/or IslamicMatch.org with respect to any transactions or services by, with or in connection with IslamicMatch.org for all purposes shall be governed by this agreement. The terms and conditions may be changed and/or altered by IslamicMatch.org from time to time at its sole discretion.

Criteria

IslamicMatch.org shall act on the basis of the information that may be submitted by you, believing the same to be true and accurate even if the information is provided during the registration is by your family, friends, relatives on your behalf under your consent. IslamicMatch.org is under no obligation to verify the accuracy or genuineness of the information submitted by you. The minimum age for registering in IslamicMatch.org is 18 years for both men and women. You represent and warrant that you have the right, authority and legal capability to enter into this Agreement and that you are neither prohibited nor disabled by any law in force from entering into a contract.

You have gone through the Terms and Conditions and agree to be bound by them. If at any time IslamicMatch.org, in its sole discretion, is of the opinion or has any reason to believe that you are not eligible to become a member or that you have made any misrepresentation about your eligibility, then IslamicMatch.org reserves the right to terminate your account and/or your right to use the services of IslamicMatch.org.

Term

This Agreement will remain in full force and effect while you use the website and/or are a Member. You may terminate your membership at any time, for any reason by following the instructions on the contact us pages, or upon receipt by IslamicMatch.org of your written or email notice of termination. IslamicMatch.org may terminate your membership for any reason, effective upon sending notice to you at the email address you have provided in your application for membership.

Acceptance of your profile on IslamicMatch.org is at sole discretion of IslamicMatch.org and IslamicMatch.org reserves its right to accept or remove your profile without any reason or intimation.

Invitation

You hereby expressly solicit and accept IslamicMatch.org and/or its authorized personnel to communicate to you through any telecom resources in the registered number provided by you to explain, explicate and clarify the various services provided by IslamicMatch.org and to assist, aid or support you in availing the said services of IslamicMatch.org.

If at any time, you wish to discontinue receiving the communications (including, but not limited to emails, sms and phone calls) from IslamicMatch.org, you may email to support@IslamicMatch.org to indicate the same to IslamicMatch.org and/or its authorized personnel regarding such discontinuance and you hereby agree that, unless expressly communicated to you about discontinuing communications from IslamicMatch.org to IslamicMatch.org and/or its authorized personnel, it will be deemed to be that you want to continue and solicit and invite all such or other communications from IslamicMatch.org.

You are representing that you or the phone number submitted by you is not registered with the Do Not Disturb / National Customer Preference Register and/or you have already changed your registration suitably.

You also unconditionally agree to indemnify IslamicMatch.org against all losses, damages, penalties, costs or consequences whether direct or indirect, that may arise out of any breach or violation of the aforesaid representation, commitment and undertaking.

When you visit IslamicMatch.org or send e-mails to us, you are communicating with us electronically. You consent to receive communications from us electronically. We will communicate with you by e-mail or by posting notices on this site. You agree that all agreements, notices, disclosures and other communications that we provide to you electronically satisfy any legal requirement that such communications be in writing.

Privacy Policy

Please read and comprehend our Privacy Policy, which also governs your visit to IslamicMatch.org, to understand our practices. Members agree that their profile(s) may be crawled and indexed by search engines, where IslamicMatch.org and its network sites do not have any control over the search engines behavior and IslamicMatch.org shall not be responsible for such activities of other search engines. IslamicMatch.org is not responsible for any errors, omissions or representations on any of its pages or on any links or on any of the linked website pages. IslamicMatch.org does not endorse any applicant / memberâ€™s details in any manner and you are requested to verify the accuracy of all information on your own before undertaking any reliance on such information.

Copyright

All contents included on this site, such as text, graphics, logos, button icons, images, audio clips, digital downloads, data compilations, and software, is the property of IslamicMatch.org or its content suppliers and protected by copyright laws. The compilation of all contents on this site is the exclusive property of IslamicMatch.org and protected by International copyright laws. All software used on this site is the property of IslamicMatch.org or its software suppliers and protected by International copyright laws. IslamicMatch.org's trademarks and trade address may not be used in connection with any product or service that is not IslamicMatch.org, in any manner that is likely to cause confusion among customers or in any manner that disparages or discredits IslamicMatch.org. All other trademarks not owned by IslamicMatch.org or its subsidiaries that appear on this site are the property of their respective owners, who may or may not be affiliated with, connected to, or sponsored by IslamicMatch.org or its subsidiaries.

License and Site Access

IslamicMatch.org grants you a limited license to access and make personal use of this site and not to download (other than page caching) or modify it, or any portion of it, except with express written consent of IslamicMatch.org. This license does not include any resale or commercial use of this site or its contents; any collection and use of any product listings, descriptions, or prices; any derivative use of this site or its contents; any downloading or copying of account information for the benefit of another merchant; or any use of data mining, robots, or similar data gathering and extraction tools. This site or any portion of this site may not be reproduced, duplicated, copied, sold, resold, visited, or otherwise exploited for any commercial purpose without express written consent of IslamicMatch.org. You may not frame or utilize framing techniques to enclose any trademark, logo, or other proprietary information (including images, text, page layout, or form) of IslamicMatch.org and our affiliates without express written consent. You may not use any Meta tags or any other "hidden text" utilizing IslamicMatch.org name or trademarks without the express written consent of IslamicMatch.org. Any unauthorized use terminates the permission or license granted by IslamicMatch.org. You may not use any IslamicMatch.org logo or other proprietary graphic or trademark as part of the link without express written permission. By registering your profile on IslamicMatch.org, you explicitly authorize IslamicMatch.org to automatically copy your profiles from IslamicMatch.org domain to its Region based Matrimonial Sites based on member information relevance like caste, sub caste, religion, age, marital status etc.

Your Account
) } export default TermsConditions
